siteMetadata.name: Talha Enes Ayranci
siteMetadata.title: Talha Enes Ayranci
siteMetadata.description: PhD Candidate in Computer Science at the University of Glasgow.
siteMetadata.about:
I am a second-year PhD student in Computing Science at the University of Glasgow, under the supervision of Dr. Jonathan Grizou and Dr. Mireilla Bikanga Ada. My research focuses on tangible machine learning education.
            
Apart from research, I like writing blogs, watching and playing football and exploring the beautiful places of Scotland. I also have a beginner's level interest in the philosophy of science.
siteMetadata.author: talhayranci

markdownRemark.excerpt: The Drive by Image project contributed to our understanding of the machine learning performance of smartphones. With this application, users can drive Curioâ€¦
markdownRemark.html:
The Drive by Image project contributed to our understanding of the machine learning performance of smartphones. With this application, users can drive Curio with the images captured with their smartphone camera.

Click this link to use the system (If you are an iOS user, please use Curio Host). There are instructions to use the application on the web site.

The project is written in ReactJS with Typescript. If you want to see the source codes, just check the project repo here. Feel free to explore!

frontmatter.title: Curio Drive By Image
frontmatter.description: Machine Learning based driving application for Curio.
